EesySoft User Documentation

Getting Started

What is EesySoft?

EesySoft allows you to measure the activity level and use of key functionality within your learning environment, making it ‘eesy’ for you to identify those users who are doing well and those who are in need of support.

How does it work?

EesySoft monitors the user interactions of individual users (faculty and students) within Blackboard and other (web-based) applications.

Further, EeasySoft's in-context communication tools allow your team to take action and effectively communicate with individuals and groups of users during their actual application usage. This communication can either happen proactively or by offering them on-demand context-sensitive help.

What is the result?

Higher faculty adoption & less time needed to train and support your users.

What benefits can you expect?

  • Reduce the number of application related FAQ's by 80%
  • Offer 24/7 support to your faculty and students at a lower cost
  • Decrease time-to-resolution of support requests by up to 50%

What can Eesysoft help you with?

Measure Usage

Knowing in real-time which areas of your application need attention can prevent wasted resources.

Optimize Adoption

By promoting new and useful functionality, your institution gets a chance to explain why, how, and where users can best use them.

Improve Support

Providing an easy to use, and ongoing support structure for users can improve their confidence in the application while reducing your institution’s support costs.
